response.name: Response after variable set
response.default-help: Use $value to get new variable value

useIfInCommand: Use if you use variable in command. Will return only updated variable without response.

variable.name: Variable name
variable.help: Variable name must be unique, e.g. $_wins, $_loses, $_top3

error.isEmpty: Variable name must not be empty.

currentValue.name: Current value
currentValue.help: If type is set to Evaluated script, value cannot be manually changed

usableOptions.name: Usable options
usableOptions.help: Options, which can be used with this variable, example: SOLO, DUO, 3-SQ, SQUAD

error.atLeastOneValue: You need to set at least 1 value.

testCurrentScript.name: Test current script
testCurrentScript.help: Click Test current script to see value in Current value input

historyIsEmpty: History for this variable is empty!
warning: Warning: All data of this variable will be discarded!
